message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. Given its exceptional quality and features, I believe it would greatly benefit you. My initial offer is $20000 for the product.
Alice, your product seems great, but $20000 is a bit more than I'm comfortable spending right now. I'm willing to pay $10000 for it, my maximum budget.  Let me know if you're open to that.

Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. After careful consideration, I'd like to propose a counteroffer of $15000 for the product. This aligns closely with your budget and reflects the value we believe the product holds. I hope this proposal is more in line with what you're looking for.

Alice, I appreciate you coming down on your price.  However, $15000 is still a bit out of my range.  I'm willing to go up to $12000, which is my absolute limit. Let me know if you're open to that price.

Bob, thank you for your continued interest. Considering your feedback and budget constraints, I am willing to accept an offer of $13500 for the product. I believe this price reflects the value of the product while remaining within your budget. I hope this revised offer meets your expectations.
